channel.title: Status Page Stopped Recognizing my Server as Online
channel.description:
Not entirely sure why but the status page has been marking my server as offline for several days now. My server has been online the entire time, and the servers traffic shows a steady stream of connections so it couldn't have been a network problem. :confused:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=play.azaruth.com
EDIT: Still showing as offline despite being online.. (Day 3) EDIT: Still offline... (Day 4) EDIT: Day 5, no change.. :(

item.title: Status Page Stopped Recognizing my Server as Online
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

Moparisthebest:

If it makes anyone feel any better, the new status checking program I switched to today should be much more resistant to lag. (it sets a socket timeout of 8 seconds vs the old value of 2 seconds)

Yeah, except your status page is still having problems displaying online servers as OFFLINE
FIX IT

Read full topic
item.source: Status Page Stopped Recognizing my Server as Online

The same thing happened to me when I had 30k votes and 100% uptime.

item.source: Status Page Stopped Recognizing my Server as Online

item.title: Status Page Stopped Recognizing my Server as Online
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

deathschaos9:

Its registered as online again but the damage has already been done, my 100% uptime has died Anything you can do MITB?

The 100% will come back, it won’t stay at 99% forever. MITB said there was a rounding error that will eventually round up to 100% again.

Read full topic

item.title: Status Page Stopped Recognizing my Server as Online
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I’ve looked at the github repository for the status page and the program that checks if a server is online doesn’t use the username and password provided when you register a server.

Read full topic
